phrs.translation: 长号, 低音号, 伸缩号, 深缩号
次中音长号, 高音长号, 中音长号
伸缩喇叭的麻烦, 伸缩喇叭的费事
低音长号, 仿雅马哈型, 低音

sentences.sentence: Her husband had played the trombone in the band for a decade.
sentences.translation: 她丈夫已在这支乐队吹了十年的长号。

sentences.sentence: Every time I sing that line, I have to compete with that darn trombone!
sentences.translation: 每当我唱那行歌词时，我都得和那该死的长号比赛。

sentences.sentence: Not bad considering what I did to that poor trombone!
sentences.translation: 考虑到我对那个可怜的长号所做的一切，这已经很不错了！
